Title: Establishes a statewide youth mental health and social media campaign to promote public awareness of the impacts of social media usage on mental health
Summary: Establishes a statewide youth mental health and social media campaign to promote public awareness of the impacts of social media usage on mental health; requires a course of study on social media usage for all students.
LawCode: Add Art 25 Title 7-A ยง2596, Pub Health L; add ยง805, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to establishing a statewide youth mental health and social media campaign to promote public awareness of the impacts of social media usage on mental health
